body:
Just as a short FYI, the staff have moved the TeamSpeak over to our Avicus servers. This is due to lack of control and messy permissions on the previous server. 

Your ranks will be gone, but the TeamSpeak has not changed. Donator ranks can be given to you by Moderators, and any other ranks by Senior Moderators.

Also, if there is any turbulence, connection problems, rank/perms issues, please let me know. Also make sure to post any suggestions for the new TeamSpeak below!

IP: ts.avicus.net

IP: ts.avicus.net
title: TeamSpeak Reconstruction

replies.body:
Please edit the Music channels that they have Music codec at quality level 10 (11.87 KiB/s)
and don't forget to set the needed talk power of the MusicBot room to 10, so only the Bot can stream the music :)


Nice work Micheal

replies.body:
Bug reporting: Can't join AFK channel because "maxfamily" has been reached

Fix it with changing Family Max Users to Unlimited (my guess :p) 

EDIT: Fixed

replies.body:
"the staff have moved the TeamSpeak over to our Avicus servers"

I don't quite understand, what does that mean?
replies.body_tagged:
"the staff have moved the TeamSpeak over to our Avicus servers"

I don't quite understand, what does that mean?

replies.body: We were paying for TeamSpeak with a separate service, but now it's hosted on the same servers as the Minecraft Server and the Forums.
